comment: Dr.Shubam is amazing! She cares about her students and makes them feel comfortable. The course content is also super interesting and causes you to self-reflect.  Attendance isn't mandatory, but try to attend because she gives random in-class assignments that go towards your grade! Also, take good notes so you can do well on the quizzes. Take her!

Ive never made a review for a professor until now, Dr. Shubam is easily one of the nicest and caring professors you will EVER have. Dr. Shubam will give you clear feedback and has very clear yet easy expectations. She loves getting to know students and makes it a point to know your name. Please take her as this class and her instruction is a gem.

Love Dr. Shubam, great energy. She not only cares about your education but, also your well being. Very informative and passionate on the material. She made this class fun and pushed for participation!! She genuinely cares about her students and is very open. Sometimes would have tickets out the door about how you felt about the class/school/etc

Professor Sharma is amazing! Any students who has her is impacted by her ability to care so much about her students. Her coursework is average but she does give you grace if you are struggling and cares about your well-being!

Professor Sharma is literally the best professor I've ever had. She's so kind and passionate about the material. She responds to emails quickly and I loved going to her office hours to talk. She encouraged us to ask questions or comment about the lectures in class. You stay engaged by writing extra notes on her PowerPoints. The class was easy too.

Dr. Sharma is an angel. She is super understanding and easy to contact/communicate with. Her notes are used on the quizzes and the powerpoints are accessible outside of class. The project over the semester was honestly kinda fun. I'm gonna miss her.

Professor Sharma gives great lectures and is really easy going. She wants you to succeed and participate in her class, either way if you attend lecture and take good notes you should get an A or B. 10/10 person/professor.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Participation matters

comment: I love her! she cares about all her students and explains the material throughly and isnt boring. Definitely take this class with no hesitation ! youll love it! just 4 quizzes and some easy papers throughout the semester. gives out snacks
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Participation matters

comment: I wish I had her for every class! She makes her lectures interesting, and if you have a lot going on and you feel like you arent able to turn in an assignment on time she will work with you! She always asks us how we are doing. She is by far my favorite professor!

Can't even begin to explain how amazing she is, I wish I could have her for every single class. She truly cares about you and your grade. Her class is very easy to pass as long as you listen and take notes. By far my favorite professor I've ever had and will ever have. Quizzes are open note.
